citations.narrative:
** Inside the front gate of the main pasture, off to the left side there was numerous piles of debris, gates and other
materials. The animals housed in the pasture do have access to this area. The hoofstock could climb on the debris and
get injured or become entrapped. The debris must be removed from the areas that animals have access to. Premises
(buildings and grounds) must be kept clean and in good repair to protect the animals from injury.
** The facility did put a fence around the debris pile so the animals could not access the area. A section of the fence had
fallen down allowing possible access which could cause injury to the animals. The fence must be repaired and maintained
so that it restricts access to the area.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
William Snow, SUPERVISORY VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.131(c)  Repeat
   
Sanitation. 
** Inside the front gate of the main pasture, off to the left side there was numerous piles of debris, gates and other 
materials. The animals housed in the pasture do have access to this area. The hoofstock could climb on the debris and 
get injured or become entrapped. The debris must be removed from the areas that animals have access to. Premises 
(buildings and grounds) must be kept clean and in good repair to protect the animals from injury.  
** The facility did put a fence around the debris pile so the animals could not access the area. A section of the fence had 
fallen down allowing possible access which could cause injury to the animals. The fence must be repaired and maintained 
so that it restricts access to the area. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
William Snow, SUPERVISORY VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
